html.main: <lux-form data-options='luxforms.trianglify_111l4'><script>if (!this.luxforms) {this.luxforms = {};} this.luxforms.trianglify_111l4 = {"children": [{"children": [{"field": {"min_value": 1, "type": "number", "value": 150, "max_value": 1000, "required": true, "name": "cellsize", "label": "cell size"}}, {"field": {"min_value": 0, "type": "number", "value": 1, "max_value": 1, "required": true, "name": "fillOpacity", "label": "fill opacity"}}, {"field": {"min_value": 0, "type": "number", "value": 1, "max_value": 1, "required": true, "name": "strokeOpacity", "label": "stroke opacity"}}, {"field": {"min_value": 0, "type": "number", "value": 0, "max_value": 1, "required": true, "name": "noiseIntensity", "label": "noise intensity"}}, {"field": {"max_value": 1, "type": "text", "required": false, "min_value": 0, "label": "x gradient", "name": "x_gradient", "maxlength": 50}}, {"field": {"max_value": 1, "type": "text", "required": false, "min_value": 0, "label": "y gradient", "name": "y_gradient", "maxlength": 50}}], "field": {"type": "fieldset"}}, {"field": {"name": "redraw", "disabled": "form.$invalid", "label": "redraw", "click": "luxforms.redraw", "type": "button"}}], "field": {"id": "trianglify_111l4", "model": "trianglify", "labelSpan": 6, "type": "form", "layout": "horizontal"}};</script></lux-form>
